long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of repetitive typing? QuickFill helps you:

Answer Emails and Chats in 1 Click: 
by Auto-suggesting personalized responses using your own snippets / templates.

Stay Organized Across Multiple Accounts: Easily manage separate workspaces for different companies or projects without mixing up templates.

Work on Any Website: Insert snippets or templates into forms and fields on any webpage.

How QuickFill Works:

Website Context Personalization: Automatically detects the website (e.g., Gmail, Outlook, or chat) to suggest the right templates.

Account-Aware Workspaces: Detects your logged-in user to switch templates for the right account or company.

Dynamic Snippet Insertion: Lets you place snippets into any input field or form with a single click.
